definitions.text: act in concert or unite in a common purpose or belief

examples: she unites charm with a good business sense

definitions.text: be or become joined or united or linked
examples: The two streets connect to become a highway
The travelers linked up again at the airport

definitions.text: bring together for a common purpose or action or ideology or in a shared situation
examples: the Democratic Patry platform united several splinter groups

definitions.text: characterized by unity; being or joined into a single entity
of or relating to two people who are married to each other
